participant_1.background:
I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect.
I could brag about my ability to endure physical pain and my endless curiosity about the world.
I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast!
i have a bad habit of being dishonest.
i do not like coffee.

participant_2.background:
I love to eat fresh produce from my family's farm, especially after a long hike.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.
I live far from my family, but I love them.
I'm not really a gym person, but I go for walks every day with my cats.
I am a passionate educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students.

content.text: Not much.  Just hanging out.  What about you?
Same here.  Just got back from Comic Con.  It was so much fun!
That's awesome!  I've never been to one before.  What was it like?
It was amazing!  There were so many people dressed up as their favorite characters.  I even saw a few people dressed as characters from The Walking Dead.
That's so cool!  I love The Walking Dead.  I'm actually in the middle of writing a short story about it.  Do you want to read it?
Sure!  I'd love to read it.
That was really good!  I loved the suspense and the action.  It was so exciting!
Thanks!  I'm glad you liked it.
I think it's really cool that you're an author.  I've always wanted to write a book, but I've never had the time.
It's never too late to start!  You should give it a try.
I might just do that.  Thanks for the inspiration.
